title: Managing Adverse Skin Reactions Associated With Central Line Dressings in Children: A Survey of Dermatologists
details: C Mulinda, MC Garzon, KD Morel, LE Levin, C Collins… - Pediatric dermatology, 2024
abstract: Central line dressings (CLDs) may be associated with adverse skin reactions in hospitalized children. Currently, standardized protocols to guide the management of cutaneous CLD reactions are unavailable at our children's hospital and in the …
